analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi
translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on the Conditions for Phenomena

original: 19.15. Ajjhattattikadvaya🔽Naajjhattaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
analyzed: ajjhat tat tika dvaya  na ajjhattam dhammam paṭicca bahiddhā dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka
translated: The Triad on Conditions🔽With internal states as condition, external states. One

original: Nabahiddhā dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na bahiddhā dhammam paṭicca ajjhattaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With external states as condition, internal states. One

original: Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.🔽Naajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
analyzed: hetuyā dve pe avigate dve  na ajjhatta ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca ajjhatta ārammaṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā dve
translated: With internal states as condition, internal states. Two🔽With external states as condition, external states. Two🔽With internal states as condition and with external states as condition, internal states. Two🔽With internal states as object, internal states. Two

original: Nabahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.🔽Naajjhattārammaṇañca nabahiddhārammaṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na bahiddhā ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca bahiddhā ārammaṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā dve  na ajjhatta ārammaṇam ca na bahiddha ārammaṇam ca dhammam paṭicca ajjhatta ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā dve
translated: With external states as object, external states. Two🔽With internal states as object and with external states as object, internal states. Two

original: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā dve …pe… purejāte āsevane dve …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: hetuyā cha ārammaṇe cha adhipatiyā dve pe purejāte āsevane dve pe avigate cha
translated: With internal states as condition, two; with object as condition, two; with predominance as condition, two; with proximity as condition, two; with contiguity as condition, two; with dependence as condition, two; with non-disappearance as condition, two.
